summary: NHTSA RECALL NUMBER 17V285  I TOOK MY TRUCK TO THE DEALERSHIP FOR THIS SAFETY RECALL ON MAY 9, 2017.  TOYOTA SAYS THIS PROBLEM HAS A REMEDY, BUT MY DEALER SAYS THE PARTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE.  NHTSA WEBSITE SAYS TO FILE A COMPLAINT IF REPAIRS ARE NOT MADE IN A TIMELY MANNER.   I HAVE BEEN WITHOUT THE USE OF THIS VEHICLE FOR TWO MONTHS,  HOW LONG IS CONSIDERED "TIMELY"?
